attributes.action: Call a General Election so the electorate may have its say on the behaviour of individual MPs over their financial affairs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the relevations regarding MPs allowances I believe that a General Election called in 2 months time will allow sufficient time for a new system of renumeration to be emplaced and the opportunity for the electorate to elect those individuals fit to represent the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
